item.title: Leading AI Claude Predicts the Price of XRP, Cardano and Solana by the End of 2025
item.description:
Claude predicts the cryptocurrency market will end 2025 on a high. Bitcoin’s run to $111,814 has reignited risk appetite, and the AI has singled out XRP, ADA, SOL, and Solana Layer-2 SOLX for potential outperformance, citing courtroom wins, ETF speculation, and favourable macro factors.

item.title: MEV Bots Now Clog Blockchains Faster Than They Can Scale, Flashbots Warns – Is Raw Throughput Obsolete?
item.description:
A new Flashbots thesis has shown MEV Bots dominate blockchain capacity: 40 % of Solana blockspace and over half of rollup gas on Base and OP Mainnet. This spam has kept fees elevated, so Flashbots has proposed explicit MEV auctions and programmable privacy to restore efficient scaling.

The post MEV Bots Now Clog Blockchains Faster Than They Can Scale, Flashbots Warns – Is Raw Throughput Obsolete? appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.description:
ChatGPT's advanced o3 Pro AI model has processed 47 live market indicators, including TradingView technical signals, Binance order-book flows, social media sentiment, and on-chain metrics, to deliver a surprising Dogecoin price prediction as the memecoin clings to $0.17778.

item.title: Pump.fun Accused of ‘Stealing’ $741M in Fees as Critics Call Platform a ‘Disease’
item.description:
Pump.fun has sold millions of SOL for $741M while only 293 of 13.55 M wallets have exceeded $1M in gains. The Solana memecoin launchpad now faces backlash over alleged scam activity and harmful livestreams as X suspends its account ahead of a planned $1B token issuance at a $4B valuation.
